LICENSES & CERTIFICATION.Name: Building Web APIs with ASP.NET Core

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Distributed system's scale-out architecture in today's computing world can solve many complex problems. Whether it's big data to parallel file systems to medical field or even a grid computing. It's widely used to solve very complex problems that are inherently parallel in nature. It is ideal for replication, fault tolerance, parallel applications etc.
Mutual exclusion is pretty much required when multiple nodes/co-ordinators try to get same computing resources. In this project we implemented couple of standard distributed mutual exclusion algorithms.

The project aims on compiler optimization techniques. We have done optimization on existing compiler. From naive method like constant folding to advanced methods like register allocation is implemented. Here is the full list of optimization we've done.
Constant folding & propagation
Common sub-expression elimination
Register allocation using graph coloring technique
Strength reduction etc.
